entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ILCompiler package used in runtime without ensuring matching framework #106740
  • Runtime GC metrics should show default zero prior to first GC #106733
    9.0.0
  • Libraries build blocked by `System.TypeLoadException` #106731
  • membarrier(REGISTER_PRIVATE_EXPEDITED) waits through an unnecessary RCU grace period during Linux process startup #106722
  • [android][infra] Validate .NET 9 Android functionality across different API versions #106717
    9.0.0
  • BitOperations uses much faster binary operations to replace the DeBruijn #106736
  • GC.GetTotalMemory occasionaly returns negative values #106712
  • Source generators generate longer paths than anybody can handle #106702
  • System.Text.Json: Calling Write method of default dictionary converter from a custom dictionary converter fails with NRE #106697
  • [HttpStress] Stress builds are broken on windows #106694
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ConsoleFormatterOptions.IncludeExceptions #106692
  • [8.0] Request Backport for #91980 #106682
    8.0.x
  • Webassembly httpClient response code 0 #106689
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression on 8/17/2024 12:12:18 AM #106708
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 17 Regressions on 8/16/2024 4:29:39 PM #106707
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 12 Regressions on 8/15/2024 12:39:36 AM #106706
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 2 Regressions on 8/17/2024 7:43:54 PM #106710
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression on 8/13/2024 5:29:08 PM #106709
  • 3x perf regression on 13th Gen Intel Core (i7-13800H) maybe in System.Text.Json #106679
  • application load .net com component crash #106676
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_255294/DevDiv_255294/DevDiv_255294.cmd #106675
  • Test failure: System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicConnectionTests.GetStreamCapacity_SumInvariant #106674
    10.0.0

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] Object synchronization method was called from an unsynchronized block of code. #104340
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Bad codegen with ulong -> float conversion on arm64 #106338
    9.0.0
  • Can_Run_App_With_StatiHost installer test failure in CI #42101
    Future
  • short.Parse regression in .NET 8.0 from 7.0 #94971
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 1 Regression on 8/13/2024 5:54:40 AM #106705
  • Test failure: "Internal consistency check failed" in System.Security.Cryptography.Dsa.Tests.DSASignVerify_Stream.InvalidKeySize_DoesNotInvalidateKey #106556
  • Test failure "RemoteExecutionException : Half-way through waiting for remote process." in System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.IOCompletionPortCountConfigVarTest #106494
  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder ILGenerator cannot handle catch block with newly created exception type #106485
    9.0.0
  • GCStress=3 `profiler/transitions/transitions/transitions.sh` is taking a really long time on Apple Silicon #50306
    Future
  • EventListenerThreadPool test failing in nativeaot outerloop runs #105556
    9.0.0
  • Add package readmes to shared framework packages #105334
  • [API Proposal]: BinaryReader.ReadExactly #101614
    10.0.0
  • Consider using memfd_create instead of shm_open in MemoryMappedFile if it's available #92905
    10.0.0
  • ICorProfilerCallback GC related behavior changed in CoreCLR 8.0? #106543
    10.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: Remove HW_Flag_HasEnumOperand #105702
    10.0.0
  • NegotiateAuthentication.ComputeIntegrityCheck on Windows sets an invalid QOP #103461
    Future
  • Building System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.csproj (all TFMs) fails locally #106476
    10.0.0
  • 'chrome-GetPropertiesTests' timing out #106625
    10.0.0
  • RunCrossGen logic should not modify the test binaries #8048
  • LSRA: Consider a stress mode that trashes registers #10691
  • [mono][Perf] `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.EventSourceLogger.NestedScopes_TwoMessages` regressions on 3/5/2024 8:17:11 PM #106462
    10.0.0
  • Native AOT Binaries still depend on libz.so #106566
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • inline b C_FUNC(JIT_WriteBarrier) #106741
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove package references from library tests #106737
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove unused custom marshaler code and move ICustomMarshaler and Color marshalling handling to managed code #106735
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Set GC metrics to zero prior to first GC #106734
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • Fix infinite loop in genCreateAddrMode #106732
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Grab back some performance in `RuntimeTypeHandle::GetElementType` #106730
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add callback-based Encode to AsnWriter #106728
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/9.0] [NativeAOT] Introduce pointer-based CompareExchange intrinsic and use operating with syncblock bits. #106727
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • pal init: Init membarrier() before first thread to improve start time #106724
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Fix Type System Equivalence Checks #106723
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Don't copy XUnit runner to output for local builds #106721
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0] JIT: Cast UInt64 to Single directly during const folding #106720
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Modernize C# generation tools under coreclr/inc #106719
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Make GetObjectData for arrays use canonical method table when getting the element type #106718
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix a case in MethodImpl overriding which wasn't handled as expected in ilc.exe for native aot #106716
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0-rc1' => 'release/9.0' #106715
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2520252 #106714
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0] Add NativeRuntimeEventSource metadata to NativeAot CoreLib #106713
    needs-area-label
  • Ensure that constant folding of bitwise operations for float/double are bitwise #106711
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix invalid handle bug happening when `TypeBuilder` type used in exception catch clause #106704
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that integer parsing correctly handles non-zero fractional data #106701
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/9.0] Ensure that integer parsing correctly handles non-zero fractional data #106700
    area-System.Numerics
  • Handle disabled algorithms on Azure Linux #106698
    area-System.Security
  • [browser] Fix processing of satellite assemblies from referenced assembly during publish #106696
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Stop calling morph from CSE #106695
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Always call emitIns_Mov when canskip is true #106693
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid removing CSE candidates in fgMorphExpandCast #106691
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Always convert to mask for mask APIs #106690
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix trimming for DiagnosticSource #106680
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [QUIC] Add synchronize for streams available callback #106678
    area-System.Net.Quic

Merged

  • [release/9.0] Update `MethodTable::IsDynamicStatics` and `DacpMethodTableData::bIsDynamic` to return 0/1 instead of flag value #106643
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Introduce pointer-based CompareExchange intrinsic and use operating with syncblock bits. #106703
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Try re-enabling some CoreCLR/NativeAOT tests #106514
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Provide System.Composition package readme #106443
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • JIT: Cast UInt64 to Single directly during const folding #106419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0-rc1] Test fix: Fix IOCP count config var test #106669
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Fix getting array function type in RuntimeTypeSystem.IsArrayMethod #106512
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add NativeRuntimeEventSource metadata to NativeAot CoreLib #106641
    area-System.Threading
  • Add tests for trim warnings for marking types by name #106651
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0-rc1' => 'release/9.0' #106649
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Fix IOCP count config var test #106664
    area-System.Threading, 10.0.0
  • Fix invalid handle bug happening when `TypeBuilder` type used in exception catch clause #106665
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [release/9.0-rc1] Include libz.a in native aot packages #106673
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix SSPI ComputeIntegrityCheck with Sign level #105605
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Ensure that integer parsing correctly handles non-zero fractional data #106506
    area-System.Runtime
  • [cdac] Remove extra [] in array type name #106662
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Rewrite profiler notify callbacks into managed #106604
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Use memfd_create when available #105178
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Implement BinaryReader.ReadExactly #106238
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Remove a workaround in targetingpacks #106681
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Build libs.tests -allconfigurations in CI #106474
    needs-area-label
  • [browser] disable trim warnings in unit tests #106623
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Disable NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds test on Alpine #106635
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove RuntimeHelpers.IsReference from NativeAOT #105118
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • `__ComObject` invoke through reflection fix #106677
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Delete workaround for classic zlib #106659
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Include libz.a in native aot packages #106569
    area-System.IO.Compression

Updated

  • Fix dataflow warnings for invalid trim annotations #106672
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Use TestExclusionList in bringup_runtest.sh #106201
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update System.Net.* unit tests to react to SYSLIB0057 obsoletion #104487
    area-System.Net, test-enhancement
  • Split dotnet/runtime-only downlevel LibraryImport support into its own source generator #106436
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 10.0.0
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Sys.RT.Caching.MemoryCache - Remove unhandled exception handler #106221
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.Caching, 8.0.x
  • The mask of shift amount in `IShiftOperators<byte, int, byte>` should be 7 #103900
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono][mini] Interlocked.CompareExchange intrinsics for small types and enums #106660
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Run native aot runtime tests on cet compatible machines #105288
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Don't keep members of pointer or byref element types #106215
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/9.0] Fix Issue #105820 #106656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Upgrade zlib-ng to 2.2.1 #105771
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Use ProjectReferences in inbox src projects #106329
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 10.0.0
  • Use FeatureSwitchDefinition in a few places #106564
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [NRBF] Address issues discovered by Threat Model #106629
    new-api-needs-documentation, binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • add support for parallel Connect #106374
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Add Azure 3.0 helix test #106330
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix logging formatting #106367
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.10
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Type System Equivalence Checks #106667
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.10
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bump versioning to .NET 10 #106421
    area-Infrastructure, 10.0.0
  • Make SafeEvpPKeyHandle.OpenKeyFromProvider throw PNSE on OSSL less than 3.0 #106397
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Disabled stackoverflow tests with largeframe for RISCV64 #106383
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Explicitly use para separators in the System.Runtime.Intrinsics XML docs #106652
    documentation, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • JIT: Improve codegen around unsigned comparisons #105593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add Non-Faulting behaviour for Sve.LoadVector*NonFaulting*() #106648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mark Encoding as nullable in StreamWriter's constructor #106658
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Clean emsdk setup #106403
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Instrumentation #100294
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • JIT: Put all CSEs into SSA #106637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix GenerateResolveStub #106562
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add JIT Helpers for RISCV64 #106540
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-20
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Migrate the last LLVM helper to WASM and delete `LLVMObjectWriter` #2655
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] add support for building WASI and browser debug & release on Linux #2605
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide an easy toggle to control if Satellite Assembly generation should be run #42865
  • `dotnet` CLI does not work under gVisor #42862
  • dotnet format style --include-generated does not format generated files. #42852
  • dotnet run ignores verbosity level and outputs "Building..." even if it set to quiet. #42851
  • Disable Tests Failing Due to Initial net10.0 Branding #42850
  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET 9RC2 SDK installed, Error "Workload uninstallation failed: Failed to verify Authenticode signature......" for happens when uninstalling workloads but the workload has been uninstalled. #42848

Closed

  • Track signature errors #42870
  • dotnet processes stay alive after running any commands via cmd - on Windows 11 - .NET8 #42868
  • `dotnet build` should error out when building legacy project #9612
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Stop using IReadOnlyList when it's always single #42866
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Handle Execution ID in dotnet test #42863
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Add analyzer redirecting VSIX #42861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert disabling the toolset package in Helix #42860
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc1] Enable CI builds for the public RC2 branch #42872
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • re-enable the framework hosted compiler test #42843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42736
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove locale from diagnostic-ids link #42830
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • Enable Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #41936
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Partner request
  • Workload set garbage collection #42475
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Alpha Branding #42743
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the loc build to target 9.0.1xx #42746
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    Area-Tools
  • Enable workload search for users to find latest set versions #42652
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add RemoveJsonPropertyPostAction for symmetry with AddJsonPropertyPos… #42836
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • NET tool roll forward error experience #38210
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-preview.7.24407.1 August 2024 Updates #42699
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove the install of all runtimes 5.0 and below. #42327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #42837
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add analyzer redirecting proposal #42437
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #42739
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #42807
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Better Conversion From Collection Expression #8374

PullRequests

Created

  • Prefer element type conversions over collection type conversion comparisons #8377

Merged

  • Add a proposal for better conversion from collection expression #8348

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Flaky test: Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.MSBuild.UnitTests.NewlyCreatedProjectsFromDotNetNew.ValidateVisualBasicTemplateProjects #74827
  • Anonymous-Params-delegate is generated incorrectly with AllowRefStructFlag #74823
  • Should collapse separate comment blocks separately #74816

Closed

  • Semantic snippets test flaw #73909
    Backlog
  • Use the Microsoft.Bcl.Memory package for the System.Index/System.Range implementation downlevel #74752
  • No nullable warning emmited for non-nullable properties on structs. #74715
  • Move logic that populates Solution Explorer Analyzer node OOP #43008
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServices.DevKit.csproj attempted to copy files to output directory during design time build #74801

PullRequests

Created

  • Skip ValidateVisualBasicTemplateProjects failing on CI due to AVE #74831
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove unnecessary cancellation tokens. #74830
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove IChecksummedObject type. #74829
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Retry design time build fix while also keeping FUTDC working #74828
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #74826
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #74825
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add `IAnalyzerAssemblyResolver` public API #74820
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Needs API Review

Merged

  • Rename type for clarity #74824
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update LSP Protocol Types #73911
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Skip vsix crossgen targets when running design time build #74822
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Clean inline rename session #74818
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Semantic snippets tests #74808
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix Typo in LSP protocol type #74817
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Communicate with OOP process to determine if an AnalyzerReference has analyzers or source generators. #74810
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Only copy devkit assemblies for unit tests when doing a real build #74812
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Load analyzers and generators in isolated ALCs in our OOP process #74780
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Field-backed properties: update uses of IsAutoProperty #74798
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Async rename commit #74794
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Reduce allocations from newline information allocated by ChangedText.GetLinesCore #74728
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • 17.10: Cherry-pick fix for scenario where lightbulbs weren't being displayed #74760
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix allow ref like types for synthesized TypeParameterSymbols in Ad-Hoc Delegates #74714
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in CSharpSyntaxFacts.AppendMembers (again) #74790
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Added handler for Razor Endpoint #74815
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove dependency on deprecated ref package #74814
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Optimize single spread collection expression for `List<T>` #74769
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Report fading locations as part of the main diagnostic #74541
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix null encoding in new document in move type action #74623
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Allow ref enumerators in async/iterator methods #74800
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Collection expressions: nullable analysis of spread element expression #74686
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, New Feature - Collection Expressions

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: json #57433
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #57432
  • Breaking change for IdentityRole object not documented #57427
    .NET 10 Planning
  • SharedFxTests and TargetingPackTests tests are unable to find ASP.NET Core files on local Linux build #57426
  • ExcludeFromDescriptionAttribute not excluding controller actions from OpenAPI document #57425
    9.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.7.24407.12] Fail to build the app with error “System.ArgumentException: An item with the same key has already been added.” #57423
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_dapper, updates #57421

Closed

  • Update the baseline for Blazor WASM perf dashboard to .NET 8 #55917
    9.0-rc2
  • Minimal API and OpenAPI: Datetime API Parameter Results In Plain String In OpenAPI Json #46759
    Backlog
  • API description provider not lifting Container type of properties #56764
    Backlog
  • .GetAwaiter().GetResult() limitation in Blazor WebAssembly #57429
  • [Balzor]PersistentComponentState.RegisterOnPersisting(Func<Task> callback, IComponentRenderMode? renderMode) - RenderMode seems ignored #57405
  • Make compiler error instead of runtime against using ChildContent #57391
  • Improve Razor Rendering with Null References #57386
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #57394
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #57415
  • AddEndpointFilterFactory not working? #53855
  • Problem registering GET routing handler after using routing groups and adding a filter #56511

PullRequests

Created

  • [Templates] Generate single test HTTPS Certificate #57431
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Add explicit conversion for value-type returning handlers with filters #57428
    area-minimal, feature-rdf, area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Retry POST_Expect100Continue_Get100Continue #57374
    area-infrastructure, HTTP3, area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Quarantine CanSendAndReceiveUserMessagesUserNameWithPatternIsTreatedAsLiteral #57414
    area-signalr, 10.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #57434
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0-rc1' => 'release/9.0' #57420
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc2
  • Add `StringSyntax` to the `RouteAttribute` #57369
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • Add hpack decoding test #57221
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Propagate PropertyInfo for AsParameters parameters #57264
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • Forward-port the Virtualize MaxItemCount added in .NET 8 patch to .NET 9 RC1 #57400
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, ask-mode, 9.0-rc1

Updated

  • Fix code generation for parsing optional array parameters in RequestDelegateGenerator #57336
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-networking
  • Removing unsafe code in BufferExtensions #57417
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Treating empty string in form post as null for nullable value types #52499
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Upgrade xunit version to 2.9.0 #57303
    area-infrastructure
  • Microsoft.extensions.api description.server allow specifying environment #55836
    area-mvc, area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Allow cascading value subscribers to get added and removed during change notification #57288
    area-blazor, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update EFCore.AspNet.Specification.Tests dependencies #34485
  • Remove DISTINCT inside MIN/MAX operations #34483
    Backlog
  • Remove DISTINCT inside singleton queries #34482
    Backlog
  • Concurrency Handling in UpdateRange case #34481
  • How to force database argument evaluation? #34480
  • Model is rebuilt when the database root changes #34476

Closed

  • OPENJSON: Contains in string[] #34475
  • Primitive collections cannot be projected when using server evaluation #34479
  • Allow passing in options to IDbContextFactory.CreateDbContext #34156
  • The message "An exception occurred while iterating over the results of a query for context type 'X'." can not be caught #34430

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34487
  • Update Microsoft.Build.Locator #34486
    tell-mode
  • (RC2) Persist `Id` values into owned collection JSON documents #34478
    tell-mode
  • Associate the DatabaseRoot with the scoped options instance and not the singleton options. #34477
  • Code cleanup (4) #34474
    Servicing-approved, tell-mode

Merged

  • Enable PoliCheck #34484
    tell-mode
  • Update SDK to 9.0.100-preview.7.24407.12 #34472
    tell-mode
  • Persist `Id` values into owned collection JSON documents #34466
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34460

Updated

  • Fix ESCAPE clause for Azure Synapse. #34463
  • Use [CallerArgumentExpression] for parameterName argument in Check methods #33524
  • Cosmos: strip implicit casts to allow vector search over arrays #34437
